content: go to the free graphs and assembly instructions here 1 > **please note ** the graph for this pattern is free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future **description ** is there anything better than sweet strawberries how about 10 of them seamed together into a fun and customizable bag because with the cute strawberry bag that s what you get this design is worked in 10 individually made from the bottom up in single_crochet stitches that are then seamed together to create the body of the bag once the body of the bag is complete the straps are added and you re all set the basic design is a fun and easy square that you can use to make the bag or use as a piece of a separate design and don t let the color work worry you if you can do a single_crochet you can make this design just check your gauge and keep your gauge even this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com the sample in the photos was made in brava worsted 2 and brava speckle 3 by we crochet you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2024 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/free-cute-strawberry-bag-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/4fwhj 3 https //shrsl com/4fsdg
